ppy/osu-tools.summary: Recent activities include the addition of an option to populate score parameters on SimulateScreen using score ID, merged in pull request #241, and the submission of a pull request with the same functionality, showcasing ongoing efforts to enhance simulation capabilities.

ppy/osu.summary: The repository has seen the implementation of a feature to mark beatmaps as played, merged in pull request #31138, demonstrating continuous improvement of the platform's functionality.

ppy/osu-server-beatmap-submission.summary: A pull request has been submitted to enhance observability by integrating Sentry and Datadog, and adding extended logging, aiming to improve the monitoring and analysis capabilities of the beatmap submission process.

ppy/osu-web.summary: A pull request has been submitted to include user tags in beatmapset search, requiring the construction of a new beatmap search index to support the addition of tags to the nested beatmap object, highlighting the ongoing development of search functionality.
